name: Transporter Trailer Truck New
description:
Transporter Trailer Truck New is one of the best car transporter games. Get behind the wheel and drive heavy trucks to transport cars inside the city. The driving and transporting task might be difficult but this is what will make you a pro driver. It’s like a driving school for you where you learn to drive multiple cars.
Features:
- Real feel of driving a Multi storey car transporter
- Transport Different Vehicles on your Cargo Truck
- Amazing 3D graphics & Realistic Car Driving
- Thrilling gameplay with Multiple Car Driving
- Powerful off-road truck driving adventure.
